reviewText: This is one of the best things I've seen in years. Gritty sci-fi with great characters. Please, please release it on DVD for region 1! I want to buy a copy for  each of my dearest friends & relations.

Please release the Charlie Jade DVD for region 1!  This is an amazing show and I have been dying to add it to my collection.  I do not understand why we cannot get it here in the land of the free and the home of the brave.  For the love of the Metaverse, give us Charlie Jade!

I love this show and would like to see it available in the DVD with Subtitles for the hearing impaired, actor/director comments, and behind the scene information.  Blu-Ray version would be AWESOME!! :D
